body: `MAXIMUM_WAIT_OBJECTS` is defined as 64. It's the maximum number that `WaitForMultipleObjects` can accept. Is it better to hold the main process when the storage is full or set up a cache linked list?
body_html: MAXIMUM_WAIT_OBJECTS is defined as 64. It's the maximum number that WaitForMultipleObjects can accept. Is it better to hold the main process when the storage is full or set up a cache linked list?
